subject: URGENT: Unauthorized Transaction on My Account
body:
URGENT - Please help immediately!

I noticed several unauthorized transactions on my account (ACC-2021-7788) yesterday:

- $500 withdrawal at ATM in New York (I'm in California)
- $1,200 online purchase from unknown merchant
- $350 transfer to unknown account

Total unauthorized amount: $2,050

I have NOT made these transactions and my card is still in my possession. I suspect my card details have been compromised. Please block my card immediately and initiate a fraud investigation.

I have attached screenshots of the transactions from my online banking.

Please contact me urgently.

Michael Chen
Phone: (555) 123-4567
